title: What happens if?
body:
Apologise in advance if im posting this in the wrong board.

i've been wondering about what will happen if you purchase an ip boost for a period of time and then get suspended.
Will the ip boost be paused?

replies.body:
Hey there,

If it's a time-based boost then the boost will expire while your account is suspended.

If it's a per-game boost then in theory the boost will remain after the suspension.
